name: Pixel Perfect (TechHead)
description:
Just a short, tough precision platformer.

Contains generous servings of coyote time, spikes, and optional collectibles.

CONTROLS:
A+D, arrow keys, left stick, or D-Pad to move
Z, M, or A (On Xbox controller) to jump
S, Down Arrow, B or X (On Xbox controller), or D-Pad Down to slide and build momentum
W, Up Arrow, Y (On Xbox controller), or D-Pad Up to finish the level

The last two levels were NOT made by me, and are extra tricky. I'm not sure if the last level is humanly possible.
